listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.2-2 are included:

listitem.simpara: The description of the &ucsUCRV; variable ldap/acl/read/anonymous has been fixed (37976).
Cleanup old backups in univention-ldap-backup (38554).
An LDAP ACL preventing access to objects with uid root has been added (11800).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The Univention Blog has been added to the help menu entries (45281).
For privacy reasons the username is not stored anymore in a cookie or in a HTML5 local storage, to remember the last logged in user (45461, 45390).
build-report.txt was removed from the debian package univention-web(45391).
The directory listing of /var/www/univention/ has been disabled (45394).
Adding and removing favorite modules now works properly again (44526).
A failed login caused the login button to become invisible. This is now prevented (44989).
The max open files soft limit of the UMC-Server has been raised (45309).
The SAML authentication robustness has been improved. Errors during LDAP authentication now contain more information about the cause (44382).
The text of app and module tiles is now resized dynamically e.g. when the screen size changes (45477).
An UMC-Server crash which happened occasionally is prevented (45254).
Long words in the descriptions of app and module tiles are now wrapped into a new line (45477).
The styling of calendar and date selection widgets has been improved (45491).
A standby animation is shown until all form values are loaded when modifying objects (45574).
The transition for hiding and showing the 'Favorites' category works properly again (44526).
The selection in grids is now kept when changing the sort order or the visual presentation (45261).

It was not possible to enable checkboxes which used the boolean syntax in an extended attribute with a default value of 1 because they were detected as already activated. This behavior has been corrected (45066).
The search field in combobox widgets is shown again when the LDAP size limits are reached (44905).
The Content-Security-Policy did not include if the &ucsUCR; umc/web/piwik had been set to false (45396).
The help menu entries have been optimized (45281).
A portal entry to the Univention Blog has been added for Core Edition systems (45412).
The portal site was empty when the portal name was not translated into English (en_US) (45688).
A crash of the UMC-Server is now prevented which happened while the system load is very high (45676).
Since erratum 139 umc/module/timeout was not evaluated anymore which caused that the connection to module processes was closed after 30 seconds (45307).
Improved the label in the App Center gallery: It is now more clear that Apps may be installed on other servers than the local host (41010).
The handling of cache files is now more careful, leading to less error messages (45556).
When connecting to the MySQL server fails during the installation of Apps with database integration, a helpful error message is shown instead of a traceback (44441).
Fixed an issue when using the App Center on the command line without proper file descriptors (43238).
Handle certain (SSL related) LDAP connection problems more gracefully (39325).
Fixed the permissions of PasswordFile settings (45543).
Improved handling of error messages in UMC (45569).
Gracefully fail when the image of a Docker App cannot be downloaded (40110).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
Minor styling adjustments when displaying README information before installation (44002).
App installations now have finer grained error codes in case something goes wrong (43061).
Fixed problems during the registrations of Apps (44502).
The development tools now support App specific Test scripts (45493).
The App Center could operate on an outdated cache. This has been fixed (44607).
Fix problems when trying to upgrade an App that has no newer version (44384).
The App Center now operates on Apps of the next UCS version while the upgrade to that version is running (45429).
IPv6 addresses are now handled correctly and all available IP addresses of a system are written to the portal entry (beforehand, only the default IP addresses were used) (44117).
Container passwords aren't changed anymore during container upgrades (43823).
If the download of App meta data via zsync fails, the archive is downloaded via an HTTPS request (45227).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Assign well known SID's when creating users for well known security identifiers like krbtgt, guest or administrator (44333).
The sambaAcctFlags attribute is now correctly set when the locked and deactivated properties are changed at once during modification of user objects (45287).
univention.admin.modules.update() is now thread safe (45540).
The misleading parameter name module has been renamed into obj in the stub methods of simpleHook (32375).
Exceptions in the lookup function of policy and settings modules are now caught more granular (37171).
The DNS module did not show any entries if an IPv6 reverse zone exists (45600).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The primary interface is set to the first configured one, avoiding not configured interfaces (40657).
A warning is now shown when a UCS system tries to join into a domain with a lower UCS version on the UCS master (42059).
UCS App appliances now check for a valid license before starting the join process (42910).
The detection of the domaincontroller master FQDN during the initial system configuration has been fixed if the nameserver is not the DC Master (45170).
When joining into an Active Directory domain where an UCS system is already part of an dialog to replace this system is shown if that system is not reachable (43745).
When joining into an Active Directory domain any existing _domaincontroller_master._tcp SRV record will be replaced with the new one (43745).
A test to check whether the UCS master uses the memberOf LDAP extension has been added to univention-join (42505).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The files created by univention-directory-reports via the UMC module are now access protected (45644).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
Cleanup old backups in univention-config-registry-backup (38554).
The installation of univention-samba while joining a DC Slave into an Active Directory domain is now more robust (45406).
More debug output has been added to admember.py (38442).
Ignore stdout in backup cleanup cron job (to avoid unnecessary cron mails) (45408).
The referral handling in univention-python for modify operations has been fixed (45505).
An OrderedSet implementation has been added (45249).
Introduce &ucsUCR; variables backup/clean/max_age, backup/clean/min_backups and new function clean_old_backups (38554).
Fixed issue in AD Membermode check_ad_account (44762).
The re-connecting methods for add and modify of Python-LDAP are used to better handle SERVER_DOWN conditions. This was broken since erratum 116 (45474).
A python dictionary listing RIDs for well known security identifiers has been added (44333).
The PackageManger now also holds the apt lock to prevent errors in the App Center (43619).
App updates within univention-upgrade were searched within the wrong set of Apps. This has been fixed (45548).
The error handling has been improved during querying update servers for maintenance information in univention-updater(44824).
The apache certificates for the SAML virtual host (ucs-sso.$domainname) are now configurable via &ucsUCR; variables (40927).
It is now possible to configure whether SAML errors and stack traces are displayed to the user via the &ucsUCR; variable saml/idp/show-errors (45393).
The apache directory listing for /var/www/saml/ has been disabled (45394).
The automatic redirection to the SAML single sign-on login may now be disabled by setting the &ucsUCR; variable umc/web/sso/enabled to false (45597).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).

A new plugin has been added that checks the debian package status. The plugin is NOT registered by default on existing installations. If the plugin shall be used, the join script 30univention-nagios-client has to be re-executed or the Nagios service UNIVENTION_PACKAGE_STATUS needs to be added in the computer's Nagios settings in the Directory Management (40370).
Since (samba) erratum 165 the UNIVENTION_SMBD nagios service failed. The service plugin has been fixed (45454).
The nscd check has been fixed and should not incorrectly report the unknown program bound to nscd socket error anymore (45414).
The exclusion rules defined in the &ucsUCR; variables apache2/force_https/exclude/.* are now interpreted as regular expression patterns (45449).

The RADIUS helper program univention-radius-ntlm-auth now supports different formats for station ids, e.g. 1122.3344.5566 or 11-22-33-44-55-66. All non-hexadecimal characters are removed automatically before checking the station id (42722).
The styling of dialogs has been adapted to the new design (43999).
Only set nameserver &ucsUCR; variables from environment if not joined yet Docker Container Mode(45172).
The Samba parameter name resolve order can now be set through &ucsUCR; variable samba/name/resolve/order (37946, 36089).
New scripts univention-samba-lockedout and univention-samba-unlock to list the samba lockedout and unlock status of users have been added (35071).

Support <interfaces/primary> as a keyword for the &ucsUCR; variable samba/interfaces has been added. Now, newly installed Samba 4 systems will set samba/interfaces to lo and the primary interface which is represented via interfaces/primary. Thus, Samba will by default only listen on those two interfaces. This can be configured afterwards via samba/interfaces, samba/interfaces/bindonly and samba/register/exclude/interfaces (35072).
The &ucsUCR; variable samba/logonscript has been removed (41057).
Improve cleanup of old backups in univention-samba4-backup (38554).
Create Windows 10 default profile (default.V6) in univention-skel (44895).
The listener module for samba shares now correctly encodes filenames. Share names containing special characters caused errors (45338).
Fixed samba drivers permission in join script and postinst (41849).
Abort samba provision during join if broken symbolic links in /var/lib/samba/sysvol are found (45062).

Run samba-tool dbcheck --cross-ncs --fix --yes on update if there are inconsistencies. A backup of /var/lib/samba/private is performed and the fix is skipped if the available disk space is too low (44635).
Some special options for the join of Samba Slaves PDC's in UCS@school were ignored. This has been fixed (44885).
The join of (administrative) Samba Slaves PDC's in UCS@school has been fixed (45596).
The listener module for samba shares now correctly encodes filenames. Share names containing special characters caused errors (38688).
The S4 connector no longer overwrites the msGPO links in OpenLDAP while joining the UCS system (45439).
A check for the correct RID of the krbtgt account (and fix if possible) has been added (44333).
The detection of the primary group during creation of user objects with special characters in their samAccountName has been fixed (44374).
UCS@school specific settings have been moved into the join script (45210).
The S4 Connector now handles invalid pickle files (34648).
An error during removing a GPO has been corrected (45088).
The S4 Connector synchronizes attributes with a case sensitive compare. Previously a case insensitive compare was the default (39309).
Adapt to code changes in univention-lib (43745).
The error handling in the UMC module has been improved (41619).
It is now prevented to start multiple instances of the AD Connector (41335).
LDAP operations are now correctly escaped in the AD Connector (11658).
It is possible to start the AD Connector service process in foreground (45037).
Fixed errors in the SQLite escaping in the AD Connector (38619).
univention-adsearch now accepts multiple attributes in the ldap filter (45134).
Some objects were identified as the wrong object type. The identification handling has been fixed (45011).
The AD-Connector skips (re)recreation of UDM deleted objects (40813).
Fixed a deletion problem with nested groups in the AD Connector (18680).
The styling of App Appliance dialogs have been adapted to the new design (43999).

The default value of the &ucsUCR; variable repository/mirror/recreate_packages has been changed to no, as re-creating the Packages files without the corresponding override files breaks debootstrap (45185).
Move cache invalidation after daemon restart for nscd (40371).
On DC backup and slave check for pending listener transactions before changing the server password (39283).
